document_data.name: Clearlight
document_data.mainbody: The '''Clearlight''' temple was a run-down temple of [[Tymora]] in [[Luskan]]. The temple took its name from the large stained glass window in the roof which, as of [[1480 DR]], was the only know glass window remaining in Luskan.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3721}} The temple was used as the headquarters of the [[Coin Spinners]] gang and was heavily reinforced so that it resembled a fortress{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3625}} and the complex was heavily guarded.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3649}} Most of the statuary had been removed but the idol of Tymora near the altar was more or less intact and the coin-shaped altar remained. The room leading to the inner sanctum occupied by [[Eden of the Clearlight]] was heavily trapped.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3697}}
